org.opendaylight.aaa.api

Interface CredentialAuth<T extends Credentials>


  • public interface CredentialAuth<T extends Credentials>
    An interface for direct authentication with some given credentials.
    Author:
    liemmn

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Claim authenticate(T cred, String domain)
      Authenticate a claim with the given credentials and domain scope.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        Claim authenticate(T cred,
                 String domain)
                   throws AuthenticationException
        Authenticate a claim with the given credentials and domain scope.
        Parameters:
        cred - credentials
        domain - domain name, or null if not known
        Returns:
        authenticated claim
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if failed authentication
